links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-10,11).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + q^{(n-1)} = {(q^n - 1) / (q - 1)}G.f.: x/((1 - x)*(1 + 11*x)). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012a(n) = -10*a(n-1) +11*a(n-2). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012
maple: a:=n->sum ((-11)^j, j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=0..25);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 16 2008]
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,1,-11) for n in xrange(1,18)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009](MAGMA) I:=[1, -10]; [n le 2 select I[n] else -10*Self(n-1) +11*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012
